long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to a smarter way to manage your bookings data with "Smart Sort Stay22 Bookings"!

Our extension allows you to effortlessly sort the booking columns on your Stay22 booking page. With a simple click, you can organize your bookings by product, provider, category, booked date, start date, end date, booking status, payment status, commission, and more. Say goodbye to cluttered booking data and hello to streamlined organization.

📙 Features 📙
Smart Sorting: sorting actions on your booking columns, ensuring your data is always neatly organized.

🙌 User-Friendly 🙌
Our extension is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, making your booking management more efficient.

🏎️ Quick Installation 🏎️
Get started in just a few simple steps and transform the way you manage your bookings instantly.

Instructions to Install

1) Download the Extension: Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.

2) Activate the Extension: Once installed, click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to activate it.

3) Pin the Extension: For easy access, pin the extension to your toolbar by clicking the pin icon next to it.

Instructions to sorting columns:

Open Stay22 Booking Page https://hub.stay22.com/bookings

Choose the column you want to sort by (e.g., product, provider, category, booked date, start date, end date, booking status, payment status, commission).

Sort Your Data: Click on the desired column header to sort the bookings in ascending or descending order.


🔑 Go unlimited 🔑
You can sort multiple columns one after the other to organize your data according to your preferences. Get a License Key to have unlimited sort actions. https://jargonizer.gumroad.com/l/affjun


Troubleshooting / Widget Not Loading

Sometimes, the Smart Sort widget may not load correctly on the Stay22 bookings page. This can happen due to various reasons related to the page's dynamic content and single-page application structure. If you encounter this issue, simply refreshing the page should resolve it and display the widget.

Steps to Resolve:
Refresh the Page: The simplest and most effective solution is to refresh the Stay22 bookings page. This action reloads the content script and should make the Smart Sort widget appear.

Contact Support: If you continue to experience issues with the Smart Sort Stay22 widget, please don't hesitate to contact our support team at smartsortstay22@outlook.com
We are here to help you get the most out of your Smart Sort Stay22 Bookings experience.

Thank you for your understanding and support!
